title.value: SNOMED CT Qualifier For Type of Diagnosis Codes

publisher.value: Health Level Seven, Inc. - CQI WG

description.value: This value set includes all the "Qualifier for type of diagnosis" SNOMED CT codes (i.e. codes with an is-a relationship with 106229004: Qualifier for type of diagnosis).

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
